Description: Plate (fragment); earthenware; two fish painted in black and grey.
Acquisition notes: Letter from Henry Wallis to C H Read of 10 October 1902: "I am sending [...] also a small case of faience from Koos, as a gift. [...] Among the fragments are two which are not of Arab times: one is a curious blue glazed ware of Roman period?, another, red & black, of Coptic or Byzantine period."
